name: E's Laf
description:
Developed by Free since 2007, E's Laf is an air-dasher type fighter with a cast drawn from numerous Doujin projects, from RPGs and roguelikes to other free fighters such as Wonderful World . Currently match videos are scarce, but can be found by searching "E's Laf" or "イーズラフ" on Youtube and Nicovideo .

Currently in version 1.02, updates have come fairly frequently (several times a year at minimum) and a sequel is currently in the works.

The current scene for this game is being developed, as such the community is very small. Online play is included within the game client and offline play currently is the 'standard'.
